actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate held at the desk by unanimous consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from February 6 to February 17, 1981, and an adjournment of the Senate from February 6 to February 16, 1981.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from February 6, 1981, until February 17, 1981, and of the Senate from February 6, 1981, until February 16, 1981.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from February 6 to February 17, 1981, and an adjournment of the Senate from February 6 to February 16, 1981.
